author: smuzaffar
body:
#### PR description:

Currectly `EcalPedestalHistory` edmplugin is defined in src directory which means it becomes part of the `CondToolsEcal` shared library. Any plugin which depneds on  `CondTools/Ecal`  then register  `EcalPedestalHistory` which can result in duplicate plugin definition e.g.

https://cmssdt.cern.ch/SDT/cgi-bin/showDupDict.py//slc7_amd64_gcc700/www/sat/11.0-sat-11/CMSSW_11_0_X_2019-08-31-1100/testLogs/dupDict-edmPD.log

- EcalPedestalHistory
  - pluginCalibCalorimetryEcalTrivialCondModules.so
  - pluginCalibrationEcalCalibAlgosAuto.so

#### PR validation:

local build shows not errors.
title: move EcalPedestalHistory in to plugins directory to avoid duplicate definitions
